name: Robot Unicorn Attack Heavy Metal Edition
name_original: Robot Unicorn Attack Heavy Metal Edition
description:
NOW UNIVERSAL FOR PLAY ON IPHONE, IPOD TOUCH AND IPAD
"German opera metal has never gone down this smooth." - IGN
"If you love Robot Unicorn Attack (and who doesn't?), you need the Heavy Metal Edition." - Touch Arcade
Adult Swim’s enchanting tour-de-force Robot Unicorn Attack takes a mystical journey into darkness. Gallop through a treacherous landscape of bones and talons, unleashing your wrath on exploding pentagrams and floating demons to the punishing sounds of “Battlefield” by legendary German metal gods Blind Guardian. Because sometimes you just need a rainbow and sometimes you need to rip open the heart of evil.
FEATURES:
• No rainbows, fairies or fanciful meadows
• Play on your iPad for the very first time
• Looks equally menacing on your iPhone 5
• Game Center achievements and leaderboards so you can compete with your friends
